page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: This block accurately reflects the principal features of Wiltshire.There is a high preponderance of prosperous agricultural land _ this is successfully used for both arable and dairy farming. Chippenham was originally a market town.Today it is a major shopping centre and is the base for the District Council.The population has grown from about 4000 in 1939 to over 20000.New housing and industry continues to boost the size and wealth of Chippenham and it was recently nominated on a Channel 4 TV programme for the ten towns most likely to be successful for the rest of this century. The latest recreational facilities are Chippenham Harriers and Bodybuilder's Gymnasium.
